terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils
Class PickUtils

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.PickUtils
public class PickUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Contains constants and utilities of general use for object picking.

Constructor Detail

PickUtils

public PickUtils()
Method Detail

setLeafPickable

public static void setLeafPickable(javax.media.j3d.Node target,
                                   boolean pickable)
Sets whether or not an object's leaf nodes are pickable, but not its geometry. (Use setGeoPickable for leaf and geo pickability.) Although Node.setPickable is supposed to do this, an apparent bug (feature?) prevents it from working consistently.

Parameters:
target - Node representing the target object. Never null.
pickable - True to make node pickable, false to make it non-pickable.

allowSetGeoPickable

public static void allowSetGeoPickable(javax.media.j3d.Node target)
Used to setup for using setGeoPickable() in a live scene. Sets the target object's capability bits for recursively setting its geometry pickability. Must be used while the target is not live.

Parameters:
target - Node representing the object to be configured. Never null.

setGeoPickable

public static void setGeoPickable(javax.media.j3d.Node target,
                                  boolean pickable)
Sets whether or not the an object's leaf nodes and geometry is pickable. The target must be dead or the appropriate capability bits must have been set, such as with allowSetGeoPickable().

Parameters:
target - Node representing the target object. Never null.
pickable - True to make node pickable, false to make it non-pickable.
